show.subtitle: “It’s Our Money with Ellen Brown” provides a unique view behind the curtain of global finance and the monetary system by one of the top experts in the field.
show.title: It´s Our Money with Ellen Brown

header.title: It´s Our Money with Ellen Brown

title: It´s Our Money with Ellen Brown
content:
In the very first edition of this new program, Ellen provides a foundationalstatement describing the nature of our... <!--more--> debt-based money system, and whatthis show hopes to achieve.
With the recent 100th birthday of the FederalReserve and the appointment of its new Chairman, Janet Yellen, Ellen engagesthe conversation about the Federal Reserve with noted Fed scholar and authorProf.
Tim Canova, Professor of Law and Public Finance at Nova SoutheasternUniversity.
 Later, Ellen speaks with public banking catalyst Mike Krauss about therapidly growing interest in public banks and the organization behind themovement to create more.
